author: Special Correspondent
text:
Two Jail Warders of Tiruchi Central Prison earned laurels bagging medals at the All India Prison Duty Meet.

Representing Tamil Nadu, the Grade – II Warders S. Kailasam and K. Dharmaraj bagged medals in the meet held at Hyderabad from March 16 to 18. Kailasam bagged two gold medals in long jump and high jump while Dharmaraj won the bronze in Karate Shai fight (55-60 weight group).

They were presented with cash prizes by the Superintendent of Prison, Central Prison, Tiruchi A. Murugesan when they met him with the medals on Wednesday, a press release here said.
title: Jail Warders bag medals
